website_summaries.verdict: An all-natural supplement that can help to boost your mood and keep your body functioning at peak level.
pros: Supports healthy stress levels and adrenal function
Contains ashwagandha, magnesium, rhodiola and magnolia bark, which can all help to improve mood
cons: A few users have said it made them feel foggy the next day

customer_reviews.title: TRY This Before Reaching For a Quick Fat Loss Pill!
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased, I read the reviews of other users. I am quite impressed with the overall results of the product. This has dramatically reduced my stress levels, and my cortisol levels have dropped significantly. I am finally losing the stubborn fat around my waist that I have been struggling with for the past 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Cortisol health is amazing! After a day or two I noticed I ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I was stressed but I couldn't lose weight. I've known about the relationship between cortisol and weight loss for quite awhile but when I've tried other products, when I knew I was stressed, they didn't work. Cortisol health is amazing! After a day or two I noticed I seemed happier at work. Then I realized I was calmer! What a difference it is to go through my day relaxed! I'm getting more accomplished and feeling better doing it! Being more relaxed is helping me avoid 'emotional eating'. WOW! I'm sold on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Professor T

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement for Adrenal Fatigue
customer_reviews.text: This supplement is the ONLY one that has helped with what I suspect is Adrenal Fatigue. It reduces symptoms of fatigue, anxiety, and brain fog, plus helps to keep my energy level more stable throughout the day. I have tried numerous teas and supplements for adrenal support over time, and this one is nothing short of miraculous for me, thus far. I felt results the same day I started taking it. Thank you, Les Labs!
customer_reviews.author: clarabel

customer_reviews.title: Slumber like a Baby!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product after numerous other "natural sleep aids/stress relievers" fell short for me. As a professional hard-working woman in my 50s I was looking for a supplement that may help me to de-stress and sleep better. This product is phenomenal - even my husband knows that I am sleeping better! I have none of the "crazy" dreams that I have with other products and if I do wake up during the night, I fall back to sleep immediately. This product has not caused me to worry or fret when I wake up during the night. I am so drowsy that I fall back asleep almost immediately. I love this product and have already ordered a 2nd month supply!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jo

customer_reviews.title: By day 3.....
customer_reviews.text: Whew!! I've tried just about everything. For years I've been suffering with fatigue. I just took a saliva test recommended from the book "The Adrenal Solution", it's def. a worth while read. Although, needed to nip this in the bud because my work and everything has been affected. I would sometimes spend days on the couch with muscle aches, low body temperature, and exhaustion from a workout. By day 3 on Corisol Health, I'm like a new person. It really evens your cortisol levels throughout the day. Deep sleep at night. There are usually days where I'd wake up in the morning still tired...not anymore! Definately a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Allie K.

customer_reviews.title: headachy and after a few days I felt 100% better. This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: My naturopath told me to get a bottle of this because I have severe adrenal fatigue. My doctor just rolls her eyes when you say adrenals. I was tired, exhausted all day, dizzy, headachy and after a few days I felt 100% better. This is a great product! Sometimes I think adrenals are the cause for immune and chronic fatigue problems.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Explosive diarrhea - not to take on empty stomach at night!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this supplement for about 3 weeks now. It seems to help with sleep yes but another terrible side effect. Probably TMI but important for everyone to know. Explosive diarrhea especially at night, and sometimes without warning. I have been intermittent fasting (not eating after 7pm) so thought this was the cause. After reading about side effects of the ingredients I realized I probably should not have taken these on an empty stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...finally getting some ZZZZ's
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I have borderline hyperthyroidism and suffer from adrenal fatigue making it difficult to fall asleep at night. Been taking 1 pill in the evening for about a week. Not expecting any weight loss from the cortisol reduction, would be nice though. All the melatonin & exercise in the world wasn't helping and so far this product has produced sufficient relaxation, calmness of spirit if you will, that has allowed me to fall & stay sleep earlier than I was ( my avg was 2:30am) and get more than 4+ hrs a night. Last 2 days finally getting closer to 6 and the goal is 7.5-8, because I KNOW I need it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazinf
customer_reviews.text: This truly is an amazing product. I take 2 before bed and notice a huge difference the next day in my energy levels and ability to get out of bed. I suffer "secondary adrenal insufficiency" which stems from Hashimotos Disease. This gives me a glimpse back to what it was like to feel normal again. Thank you LesLabs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cardio calmness.
customer_reviews.text: Years back I would run 5+ miles for cardio in the military, and I realized my body was at peace throughout the day. I wanted to get back to that feeling but couldn't get myself motivated enough to run. Since I started my first bottle of Cortisol Health I feel the same as I did when I was putting the miles on my feet. I now feel the same calmness and my mind feels uncluttered. No foginess, just peace. I feel sharper and clearer than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I am definitely calmer during the day. ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am definitely calmer during the day. Situations that always put my nerves in a tailspin and had me over reacting no longer have the same affect. I have hypothyroid issues and have long suspected adrenal issues. This supplement has truely helped. This product doesn't make me sleepy during the day and I find it easier to get going in the morning. I take 1 capsule at night.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great for anxiety, sleep, and stress relief
customer_reviews.text: This is truly an amazing product. Over the years I've had to take Valum, Ambien, or Clonopin for anxiety, sleep and stress related issues. I now take this product along with the 5-HTP at bedtime and I noticed the results immediately! I have been taking this product for quite some time now and LOVE it. I can definitely notice a difference in my sleep when I don't take it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: holy moly, did this stuff make me irritable and ...
customer_reviews.text: holy moly, did this stuff make me irritable and restless! total opposite of what it should have done. never again.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Insomnia
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this product is good for most people, for me it worked great for the first week, then every time I took it I was completely wired and wide awake and couldn’t sleep THE WHOLE night. No exaggeration. Definitely was the products doing because I stopped it and after two days my sleep was back to normal- great ( I usually don’t have any problem getting to sleep or staying asleep) Well took it again tonight and guess what? I’m up writing this review. It’s like I drank 3 cups of coffee! I don’t see many reviews for trouble sleeping so maybe it’s a good product but just reacts poorly in certain people, but for me it’s a definite return.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Leading me to a better sense of overall well being
customer_reviews.text: This supplement helps me sleep naturally after a lifetime of insomnia; leaving me feel rested with no grogginess. In addition to my daily exercise and proper diet, it has aided me greatly to help with weight loss in those difficult areas due to menopause. Leading me to a better sense of overall well being.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FOR INSOMNIA
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS FOR INSOMNIA! im real, 33 year old man from pg county msryland. Im sure most of these great reviews are fake. I took this for middle of the night insomnia. I wake up between 3-4 everynight for 18 months straight. Tried everything the docs threw at me...all otc solutions....then i tried this. This effectively kept me up all night, wire up mind racing. Complete opposite effect. Will be returning tomorrow. I just hope i didnt create another sleep issue and can still fall asleep within 30 mins. DO NOT BUY THIS FOR IMSOMNIA!!!
customer_reviews.author: indya warr

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t see any difference
customer_reviews.text: I see no difference. I thought it would be great since I am hashimotos hypo thyroid and currently on anti depressants for stress as well as sleeping pills.
customer_reviews.author: Farideh G

customer_reviews.title: Don’t. Do. It.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does nothing at all of what it’s supposed to. Relaxing sleep? I’ve taken it 3 nights and haven’t slept at all. I usually have 0 problem getting to sleep. I’m irritable, my work has slowed. What is in this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Prestonfam

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had an allergic reaction. After 2 days of taking this product my eyes swelled up like I'd been beat up. The pharmacist told me to stop taking it, which I immediately did. With ice packs and Benadryl I was back to normal in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Santana

customer_reviews.title: It was horrible. I was also holding onto a tire around ...
customer_reviews.text: I was advised to try an Adrenal supplement to raise my energy and lower cortisol levels. I was constantly tired and couldn't wait until my next nap... It was horrible. I was also holding onto a tire around my waist, despite working out 6 times a week and counting my macros. My doctor told me to double the dose for a week and then back off to 1 X per day as recommended. I could definitely feel the difference in how I felt.
customer_reviews.author: haleycurlsforhope

customer_reviews.title: Headaches
customer_reviews.text: Tried taking this twice as directed before bed. While it helped me sleep at night. I had a headache the very next day each time I took it. I was also tired all day. Extra strength Tylenol did not help with the heachache. I will stop taking this cause the headaches are unbearable. Only plus is the sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ive been looking for something to help with stress and balancing hormones. After taking this product for a few days i started getting shakey and i couldnt sleep so i decided to come off of it. The next day i had horrible withdrawal symptoms... Headaches Insomnia Depression Shakes Nausea Low energy I am not sure why it caused this but make sure you do a test run before you use this everyday cuz im very disappointed in this product and i wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: chanahyah hawkins

customer_reviews.text: This supplement has everything you need to reduce cortisol. My husband has been struggling with adrenaline fatigue caused by PTSD. When he started taking this supplement his body returned to a baseline state almost immediately, his blood pressure is better, he is sleeping better at night and he does not feel as anxious.

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t see any benefits for myself. I’m sure it worked for others, but I didn’t notice any changes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I've already lost 10lbs in the first month.

customer_reviews.text: My physician said I could not take this because the Ashwagandha in it was contraindicated because of the medications I have to take daily due to conditions I have. Please refund to card used to purchase . Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Great product for adrenal support and for thyroid assistance
customer_reviews.text: I use this in tandem with One Body thyroid support and it works like a charm! The reason I prefer it to One Body's adrenal support is because it doesn't contain licorice extract which is notorious for depleting the body of potassium. I used licorice before and it nearly flatlined me because of that. Just so happy to find a good quality adrenal support without the licorice that actually works! I've given this to two of my sisters already and they love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Gingerich

customer_reviews.title: Stopped My Weight Gain Immediately!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I ordered these. I was having unexplained weight gain which I thought were because of elevated Cortisol. Even though all of my tests came back negative, I had a feeling — so I purchased these. I’d been gaining a pound and a half for 12 weeks while dieting and exercising. I could even keep the weight at a steady number, let alone lose any. Within 24 hours of starting the Cortisol Heath, I stopped gaining any more weight. Three days later I’d lost 3 pounds. I’ve been using this for about 20 days now and have been able to gradually bring my weight down. I’ll be buying more ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Marrazzo

customer_reviews.title: If you suffer from anxiety this indeed for you.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over a year now. Best thing for when my anxiety level are sky hight. I was getting so much weight do to stress and anxiety the minute that I started this product I lost 10 pounds. I tend to eat alot when I get anxiety this had help me so much glad that I came across this product after enormous search.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: RE:  CAUTION READ BELOW
customer_reviews.text: Purchased both day and night formula as suggested by the company that manufactures it. Gave me heart palpitations and pain. Did not have heart issues previous to taking. Took 1 per night. Was not able to return. Company has short return policy. BE VERY CAREFUL IF YOU BUY THIS PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: Works great for lowering stress!
customer_reviews.text: I am one of those classic "Type A" people who can never relax. Often, this translates into sleep issues. I've tried melatonin but it gives me crazy dreams. This supplement helps me fall asleep quickly and stay asleep, and I've noticed I feel more calm the next day. I've been taking it 2 weeks now and haven't noticed any side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my moms anxiety
customer_reviews.text: My mom (54) has been taking these for about a month now. She’s prone to having severe anxiety and panic attacks where she has to take medication to calm her down but since she’s been taking these supplements, her number of panic attacks has drastically reduced and decreased the symptoms associated quite a bit. When healthcare is so expensive these days, it was a major relief to find something that’s easy to access and actually helps. It took about a week for her to notice any difference though, so if you just started, at least try it for that long
customer_reviews.author: jenaemb

customer_reviews.title: Wow, it worked immediately!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this product for a couple of weeks and I noticed a difference immediately. I am sleeping better and my mood is a lot more even so I'm not as irritable. That may be due to the fact that I am sleeping better, but I can attribute it to this product. I can tell when I forget to take it! I have tried other Cortisol support products(one that were recommended by my family physician) and they did nothing. This one works and I will be re-ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Jchill77

customer_reviews.title: Adrenal Health is important!
customer_reviews.text: Started feeling better after the first week of taking one each night. Bloated feeling reduced immensely and slow gradual weight loss. I wish I had this years ago but I only recently became aware of adrenal health through an article on belly fat. I don’t recommend taking 2 at a time if you don’t want to feel a little draggy the next morning. Taking 1 pill every night gives me a very restful night and perky feeling in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I can really tell a difference with this supplement. ...
customer_reviews.text: I can really tell a difference with this supplement. I've had medical issues for years that I haven't been able to get answers for. I've suspected adrenal fatigue but most medical doctors don't believe in that. I decided to try this and can really tell a difference. I don't feel near as stressed about things that I have in the past and have a general improvement my physical well being. I'm hoping it will help with sleep but it hasn't yet (it's been 3 weeks). Let me say that I'm also tapering off of prescription sleeping medicine so that could have something to do with it as well. I will be ordering a 2nd bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Chellebeans

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as directed till the bottle was gone. Zero effect; saw no difference in myself whatsoever. I won’t buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I tried these for a few weeks but it didn't help with my stress level, nor helped with my quality of sleep. In fact, I had even crazier dreams than I normally have and felt more tired. I wish these had worked but nope. I gave them to a friend/coworker to try and she experienced the same issue with her dreams. So bizarre. I do have a weird thing where most medications do the exact opposite for me so it could be that, since there are so many great reviews. I dunno. I tried.
customer_reviews.author: howlingzen11

customer_reviews.title: Hotflashes,sleep, belly fat, and energy.
customer_reviews.text: This product was introduced to me by a friend on Facebook. It has improved my life so much. My hot flashes were so bad I thought about quitting work and staying home. They interrupted sleep, my thinking, and soaked me day, and night. They caused severe exhaustion and killed my workouts. This stuff made all of that go away from the 1st pill!!!!! After a few weeks I have now added a pill after workouts and that is great. The muscle soreness is far less than ever. Great product I highly recommend. My husband is so happy how it works he is gonna start taking it for his energy and workouts too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A Stride

customer_reviews.title: Better sleep
customer_reviews.text: Definitely 5 starts. I cannot tell if my stress level was lowered but I love it because just on the first day I took this pill, the quality of my sleep got improved. Right after my eyes opened in the next morning, I felt "I slept soooooooooo good".
customer_reviews.author: AYKA

customer_reviews.title: These work - no more insomnia
customer_reviews.text: I think these work! I have a high stress, never ending job and had been experiencing insomnia, along with weight gain, for about a year or two. I was tired of feeling stressed and was becoming angry (probably from the constant stress and working too much, and subequent weight gain) so one night I looked up how to combat high cortisol levels and after reading about certain herbs, found this product. I started taking these every night abut 6 weeks ago and I swear I have started losing weight and have had no sleep issues for over a month! Yay! I am ordering my 2nd bottle (or more) after I write this review!
customer_reviews.author: LoriL1970

customer_reviews.title: Where is their customer service ?
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this product to work seeing all of the reviews! For whatever reason it’s making me super fatigued, and weak. I’ve reached out to the company four times and nobody will get back to me. Super disappointing. Did stop my heart palpitations within hours, but I’m trying to figure out Am I just detoxing and if this is natural with the new product. But nobody will get back to me. Becareful guys !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cortisol blocker for anxiety and insomnia
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble sleeping for years. I have tried just about everything. Finally, I did some research and found out that high levels of Cortisol in the evening and night keeps you alert and awake. I bought a bottle of "Cortisol Health" and along with my Melatonin, my sleep improved very much.
customer_reviews.author: skykingtom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on me thus far.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for almost 30 days and notice no difference in myself. The only difference is that it makes my stomach bubble from the magnesium citrate in it. So I am disappointed since it is somewhat expensive.
customer_reviews.author: C.  Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cortisol Health saved my sanity and my life.
customer_reviews.text: I work rotating shifts and my cortisol levels were all over the place causing me to become insulin resistant. I suffered with mood swings and feeling lousy for 15 years until I discovered Cortisol Health. Now I just plain feel great all the time. It has leveled out my cortisol levels, gotten rid of my mood swings and my energy level is way up. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: Sleepless nights while taking
customer_reviews.text: Took these for two weeks. One at bedtime. Woke up in the middle of the night every night that I took it. Forgot to take my nightly vitamins twice in those two weeks. Slept the night through like normal on those nights. I don't recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: S. McCarron

customer_reviews.title: Meh, the other stuff I bought was cheaper and more effective
customer_reviews.text: While I was waiting for this product, I ran to the Vitamin store and picked up a bottle of store brand Ashwagandha (450mg). It was 1/3 the cost of this and I felt immediate results with just taking one pill. With Cortisol health, I take two pills and it doesn't feel like it is as effective. It does relieve some stress but it does not work nearly as well for me as the straight Ashwagandha.
customer_reviews.author: LMBaltimore

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for about 1 year, seems to be helping keep us chill and possibly helping reduce visceral fat
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been using this for about year now. We both think it has reduced our adverse feelings associated with stress, and may be helping further keep this from leading to excess belly fat. It's always hard to know what's going on with all the complex biochemistry and variable stressors in our daily lives, but our gut feeling is this product is helping. My only complaint is the price is too high, but once a customer they occasionally have offered up no-strings discounts here and there, even buy-1-get-1-free, which helps. I do wish they would lower the normal price, their cost is likely a small fraction of the current price.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Bierly

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!! I've been taking it for about 45 days now. It helps me fall asleep and stay asleep. It's the first time in years I haven't had to take a sleep medication. I also feel a little less bloated in the tummy area. Definitely re-ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Jeanne Alley

customer_reviews.title: it made me sick
customer_reviews.text: It did not have any positive effects on me. Instead, I got poisoned with this. That day, I had a dinner with my friends and only I woke up having a stomach ache and vomiting. We ate the same thing, and I asked my friends if they were ok because I got food poisoned. They said they were alright. They asked me if I ate anything else before sleeping. The only thing I swallowed was this pills.
customer_reviews.author: ethem coskun

customer_reviews.title: Makes me sleep but gives me nightmares
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these for a few months to try to help me distress and sleep a little better. Some weeks I take it every night, others maybe just a couple nights. What I’ve come to notice is that it gives me nightmares. On the nights I take it I have horrible, Vivid dreams. While I wake up rested, I also wake up upset and stressed because of the very vivid nightmares the stuff gives me. Are used to have this on subscribe and save but I will be canceling my subscription. I don’t imagine this side effect affects everyone, but it definitely affects me.

customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product so far. If there is improvement I will update this review. Compared to this product I do better just taking straight Ashwaghanda. UPDATE Week 3 and still no noticeable effects from this product. I realize we are all different, however this was a waste of money based on the reviews.

All while being a quart low of blood (not sure how much) while on my period. I am used to only being able to make meals and sleep while on my period. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product upon the many great reviews. I was tired in the morning no matter how much I slept. The first night I took the one pill I slept wonderfully woke up refreshed and didn't feel groggy or in a fog during the day. In the two weeks that I've been taking it I felt so much better and haven't been as tired at the end of the day. Hoping maybe to lose a few pounds I've put on as well. Thanks for a great product.

customer_reviews.text: Having M.D.D., and having severe anxiety, my cortisol levels are really high. I can never sleep and even if do, it's around 2-4 hrs. These helped immediately after taking them. My mind felt clear and my mind & body felt relaxed. I fall asleep so fast with these. Thank you to the company for existing and making these!

I can say for sure, however, that it contains ingredients that have been clinically proven in peer-review journals to reduce cortisol levels. Doctor parsed through the ingredients and agreed it could be beneficial. That's good enough for me. I take one in the morning and one at night.

I have adrenaline body type and during stressful times, my tummy accumulates fat but this supplement has calmed my nerves and I am feeling better. I just ordered one more bottle in advance in just $4.99. Thanks to their promotional offer for new customers.

customer_reviews.text: Something in the product I’m Allergic to , My face, Neck is full of hives, puffy and swollen. Dry sensitive, itching! I hope it’s not serious
customer_reviews.author: Monika luedtke

customer_reviews.title: Made me moody
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this for about 5 days and it’s messed with my mood drastically. I sleep well then I’m extremely tired and on edge the day after. My blood pressure is also up.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Better sleep, maybe a little slimmer
customer_reviews.text: My stress levels have been off the chain for about 6 months now, nothing I did seemed to help, I figured what the heck. Definitely noticed better sleep - straight thru the night without the "monkey brain." Felt more rested on waking. Had the typical stress potbelly, too and I noticed my pants fit a little looser after a month on this. Will keep taking it and see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: OMG -- this is so good
customer_reviews.text: No side effects. Made me sleepy at first then I started losing weight!!!!!!!!!! I am now requesting to get my free bottle. I also ordered another bottle but Amazon delivered it without the product inside (Amazon gave me a refund). After I get my free bottle, I will order again. My sister is now taking it (I told her about it) and she is loving it too but I am losing weight on in. I feel "well" when I take it. I take 2 to 4 pills a day. I am 52 year old woman.
customer_reviews.author: Kawaiineko

customer_reviews.title: Insomnia no more!!!
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this brand of cortisol reducing supplement because it didn’t contain and fillers. That’s important in something I’m taking every day. That said, I’ve not been disappointed. I have suffered from insomnia for 12 years....this is helping!!! I’ve never been able to stay asleep. I do now! It should be noted -this takes about a month of nightly use to take full effect and work for the insomnia. I’m sure it does other good things in that time, but as for visible results - it did take a while for me. Worth the wait. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Lama

customer_reviews.title: Our Cortisol levels are Important!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the bottle and it is well packaged, there is a great bonus offer for new customers so I am going to begin now and will come back to update. I bought this to help with my adrenals, leg cramps and sleep....also stress relief. I need to lose weight and all of these conditions have an impact. I am optimistic!!
customer_reviews.author: MizRich

customer_reviews.title: This Changed My Life.....
customer_reviews.text: Life handed me a big lemon and for a year I was trying to make lemonade to no avail. I woke every morning to panic attacks and cortisol raging through my veins to the point it was painful. I was lashing out at work in stress rage. I took this for a week and noticed a difference in my experience, no more rage, and with every week it gets better. Ive used it for almost a month and I no longer have panic attacks when I wake up. If you are debating, seriously don't, take the leap, this is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Maestro

customer_reviews.title: Made me feel horrible.
customer_reviews.text: This product kept me up at night. Racing heart and agitated.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah K. Wyant

customer_reviews.title: Ladies going through “the change” try this!!
customer_reviews.text: Almost immediately I noticed a positive difference in my menopausal issues. My digestive system improved, sleep became sound and woke well rested for a change. I feel more settled and in control and back to my normal self. I highly recommend to other ladies going through this not so easy life change.
customer_reviews.author: Jumacher

customer_reviews.title: I regret having to say that I had adverse affects ...
customer_reviews.text: I regret having to say that I had adverse affects from using Cortisol Control. I am diabetic and my glucose levels went up higher than it ever been before. I stopped taking it after four days and my glucose level has almost gone back to the level it was before I started taking Cortisol Control. It was quite scary.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product. I've been using it for a week or so and I feel calmer throughout the day and it also seems like my belly fat has reduced! I hope these results aren't temporary, I've been stressed out and bloated-looking for what seems like my whole life.
customer_reviews.author: SeaCactus

customer_reviews.title: Restores vitality and losing weight
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good about Cortisol Health. I have lost weight and gained energy. Am taking it for depleted adrenals not producing cortisol on their own. So glad to be feeling better. I am returning several months after my first review to state I have tried other products and not gotten the results I get with Les Labs Cortisol Health. The formulation works best with my system, without reaction and supplies what my adrenals do not. Thank you Les Labs
customer_reviews.author: dredaker

customer_reviews.title: Helps with stress and weight
customer_reviews.text: I've worked out religiously four times a week in the last eight months and hadn't lost a single pound and I decided to try this on a whim and in three weeks I'm down three pounds and I can see a distinct difference in how I react to stress.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann Friday

customer_reviews.title: It helps more than you realize!
customer_reviews.text: I am 48 and have had recent issues with weight gain. I have also been INCREDIBLY stressed out for almost 2 years due to finances, relationships, etc. I knew about cortisol and wondered if this could make a difference. While I DID notice a big difference after a few weeks of taking the Cortisol Health Suppliment, I knoticed a HUGE difference when I ran out of my supplements and procrastinated RE-ordering them. I have gotten more squishy in my tummy, grumpy and I have slept like crap! So I’m ordering some TODAY! And I think I’m going to also try the Insulin Health as well!!
customer_reviews.author: CKurth

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Better
customer_reviews.text: With all the stress in life my adrenal glands have been suffering. This supplement has been most helpful in improving the effect stress is having on my body. I find they provide the necessary combination an overstressed body needs. I've been sleeping better, not gaining as much weight and normalizing my blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: maria cohen

customer_reviews.title: Makes a huge difference
customer_reviews.text: I began taking the Cortisol Health a couple of weeks ago and I felt "better" almost immediately. I thought I had adrenal fatigue and my belly was "fluffy fat".... both of these symptoms are in the process of resolving now and I will continue taking Cortisol Health and plan to get my Inflammatory supplements too.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Medina

customer_reviews.title: It Works For Me
customer_reviews.text: I've taken almost the entire bottle and can say this product has been beneficial. I am calmer during the day and my belly size has decreased slightly but I can certainly tell a difference. I take it at night before bed. I don't think it has helped much with sleep but the other benefits are well worth the purchase and I will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Much better sleep
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been waking up in the middle of the night with my heart pounding. My dr said I have high cortisol levels. I can’t get into an endocrinologist for a while so I bought this supplement. I take two per night and I’ve been sleeping great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenica H

customer_reviews.title: Reduces Stress and No Junk Fillers
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It certainly is helping to reduce stress and promoting a feeling of calmness. I also very much appreciate that the "other ingredients" does NOT include magnesium stearate or silicon dioxide or other junk that so many other vitamins and herbs have in them. Other ingredients is simply: Vegetarian Capsule and Organic Rice Bran powder. Now that's healthy!
customer_reviews.author: B. W.

customer_reviews.title: Buh bye Night Sweats!!
customer_reviews.text: Night sweats Stopped after 2 nights doses!!! The 4am wake ups stopped, too!
customer_reviews.author: D. Pendragon

customer_reviews.title: Some benefits...
customer_reviews.text: Let's start saying that I've been offered a free bottle of this supplement---but it didn't look like I had to write a review in exchange for it. I bought this supplement for my wife as she has been having trouble sleeping through the night and losing weight in her tummy area has been challenging. She started using the product in April and within days she was sleeping uninterruptedly. As for her tummy area, it hasn't gotten worse--which is a plus-- but she cannot say for sure that she has seen much improvement there. She wants to keep taking it as it really helps her sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: It Helps With Anxiety
customer_reviews.text: This has really been helping me calm down and fall asleep fast at night. I have no thyroid gland and did not realize that I had a cortisol problem until I had to start taking thyroid medication. I run high from 6pm until 2am in the morning. This is definitely helping and I hope it will balance me out more throughout the entire day.
customer_reviews.author: Lightpath

customer_reviews.title: Very calming effect
customer_reviews.text: I take 1 capsule before bed and it helps me in falling asleep. I have a lot of insomnia due to infection, which causes my adrenals glands to be terribly stressed. This formula has been really helpful to my adrenals, inducing calm, and helping me sleep. The company also has great customer service. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie J.

customer_reviews.title: No benefits for menopausal women
customer_reviews.text: This had no effect on my sleep. Zero. I also could not tell you of anything else it did. No benefits to me, whatsoever, but I can't tell you I had any ill effects from it either. I am a menopausal woman- I would not recommend this to any women (in this category) seeking it's advertised benefits. There just weren't any. A good book and a freezing bedroom offer more benefits for me.
customer_reviews.author: CMac

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. My Naturopathic Dr suggests that I take this ...
customer_reviews.text: Will update when I get near the end of the bottle... so far so good. My Naturopathic Dr suggests that I take this closer to noon instead of bed based off of my saliva tests. We shall see in a month how that is working out...
customer_reviews.author: Jen F.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Made me very ill. Not sure what is in them but I made a huge mistake buying these. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: gan

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it about twice so far and will absolutely buy it again, in fact it is in my cart right now. I find it makes me a bit calmer not by leaps and bounds but absolutely find it beneficial enough for the price tag to help me with my stress level, definitely feels like a quality product and easy to swallow, no horse pills here. These are my own words, not being paid or given free product for my review.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent product. Actually it is helping me with some hormones problems that I have been dealing with for 5 years. Finally I found a good product also with hair loss. Thanks Leslabs.
customer_reviews.author: Erika M Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Helped control weight from stress from new job
customer_reviews.text: I just started a new job and found myself putting on some weight. I talked with some folks and they mentioned it was stress related. I did some research and found these. Since taking them I have dropped back down close to the weight I was prior but I don't feel anywhere near as stressed out as I was before. I do find myself sleeping better as well. I have the number bed with the app on my phone and you can tell when I started taking these by the quality of sleep. Thank you LES Labs.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with results.
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell any improvement after using this product. I was looking for cortisol reduction to enhance weight loss but this has not helped. Staying on 1200 calorie diet and exercising but no weight loss even with this product. Have used 1 1/2 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Issues
customer_reviews.text: I have a terrible time sleeping after I increase the intensity of my weight lifting workouts. Something about the physical stress increases my cortisol levels and has me waking up at 2am every single morning ready to run a marathon! After weeks of not being able to sleep the whole night and crashing at work the next afternoon, I tried this product and it has been an absolute godsend. Taking 1-2 pills a night every time I increase my workout intensity has left me sleeping like a baby. I sometime combine with 5htp if I'm having a particularly hard time sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is exceptional, thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I take this product in the morning or mid day and am happy to say, I am enjoying a significant improvement in the length, depth and overall quality of my sleep. And, since sleep is so critical, I am more productive and efficient during this day which is excellent. I am 62 years old, do not take any medications, am particular and have not changed anything else in regards to my diet or supplements. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Mellon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I take one of these a night and it calms my brain down just enough to drift off to sleep. The recommended dose of 2 capsules makes me feel groggy in the morning, but just 1 does the trick perfectly. I will never be without a bottle of these! :)
customer_reviews.author: MamaP

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping More Soundly
customer_reviews.text: Not too long after I take this, I can hardly keep my eyes open and I feel like I sleep more soundly. I've never really had issues with sleep so it does worry me that I may become addicted or dependent on this product, but I don't feel like I NEED it. It doesn't feel like something that is addictive. I haven't retested my cortisol levels since taking this product but I plan to do so soon.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tabor

customer_reviews.title: About three hours later I felt like I would be able to get up and not ...
customer_reviews.text: Strange reaction for me. Took at nite a couple of hours before bed. No improvement in sleep. Didn't really feel any different the next day until about 3:00 in the afternoon. I got so drowsy, actually sleepy, I couldn't function. Had to lay down. About three hours later I felt like I would be able to get up and not fall over. I wanted so much for these to help with sleep and anxiety attacks.Won't be taking another one of these. Too scary.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: If you have glandular issues the products will help you.
customer_reviews.text: I will be ordering the products again because of the relief I feel. I felt jittery all the time or anxious for no reason or just depressed, not a lot but just feel down. I believe all 3 products are working together to help me. So if your doctor can't find anything wrong with your thyroid gland in a blood, these 3 products may help: Thyroid Support, Cortisol Health, and Mood Boost.
customer_reviews.author: paulette hobbs

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I am sleeping much better and I haven't had ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I am sleeping much better and I haven't had episodes of intense stress/anxiety since starting this product.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

product_meta.title: LES Labs Cortisol Health, Adrenal Support Supplement for Stress Relief, Balanced Cortisol Response & Adrenal Fatigue with Phosphatidylserine & Ashwagandha, 60 Capsules
feature_bullets: SUPPORTS HEALTHY ADRENAL FUNCTION. Drug-free formula supports adrenal function and helps to control cortisol levels.
PROMOTES HEALTHY CORTISOL LEVELS. Formulated to promote balanced cortisol response, a powerful hormone released during times of stress.
SUPPORTS RELAXATION AND HELPS REDUCE STRESS. Ashwagandha and rhodiola extracts help promote relaxation. Included magnesium provides an added calming effect.
NATURAL INGREDIENTS. Natural formula including phosphatidylserine, magnesium, ashwagandha, magnolia, and rhodiola root extract.

100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE. Try Cortisol Health and see how it works for you. All LES Labs supplements include a 60-day money-back guarantee - just contact LES Labs if you're not completely happy & healthy for a refund. Our supplements are manufactured in the USA with the highest-quality ingredients from around the world.
